data_table.description: Subject ID, year of date PWV/ABI performed, height, carotid-femoral distance, suprasternal notch-carotid distance, and calculated difference between PWV2 and PWV3 of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]

variable.name: PWV1
variable.description: Q1. Height (from ANT 3C) [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]

variable.name: PWV2
variable.description: Q2. Carotid-femoral distance [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]

variable.name: PWV3
variable.description: Q3. Suprasternal notch-carotid distance [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]

variable.name: PWV4
variable.description: Q4. Calculated difference between PWV2 and PWV3 [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]

variable.name: PWV0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year of date PWV/ABI performed [Pulse Wave Velocity/Ankle-Brachial Index Data Sheet]
